snippet: Factbox on Serbia's Novak Djokovic, who beat British second seed Andy Murray 3-6 6-1 6-2 6-4 to win his first French Open title and complete a career grand slam on Sunday...
lead_paragraph: Factbox on Serbia's Novak Djokovic, who beat British second seed Andy Murray 3-6 6-1 6-2 6-4 to win his first French Open title and complete a career grand slam on Sunday

headline.print_headline: Factbox: French Open Champion Novak Djokovic
